backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor with data types and in‑memory maps for CRM, portal, documents, finance, and access control, including org membership helper and mixins for auth and storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files across authentication, data, UI states, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet placeholder; currently contains no CSS.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font, setting metadata, and mounting the app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper configuring QueryClient, routing, theming, authentication, and organization context.
frontend/src/app/layout/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper showing Topbar, Sidebar, and BottomNav when authenticated, otherwise rendering children normally.
frontend/src/app/layout/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with primary CRM and portal links plus a menu trigger.
frontend/src/app/layout/MobileNavMenu.ts: Mobile slide‑in navigation menu showing internal and portal sections based on authentication and role.
frontend/src/app/layout/Sidebar.tsx: Desktop sidebar navigation listing internal and portal sections with active state highlighting based on current path.
frontend/src/app/layout/Topbar.tsx: Top navigation bar showing logo, current organization, and a user menu with logout and mock role selector.
Redirects authenticated users to org selection or dashboard, and unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/app/router/ProtectedRoute.t: Guards routes by requiring authentication and optionally an organization, showing loading or access-denied states.
frontend/src/app/router/routes.tsx: Defines the app’s TanStack Router route structure, wrapping protected pages and linking all auth, internal, and portal pages.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Provides authentication context, switching between mock and backend (Internet Identity) modes and managing user state.
frontend/src/auth/InternetIdentityAuthAd: Converts Internet Identity data into the app’s user format and determines the effective role.
frontend/src/auth/MockAuthProvider.tsx: Implements mock authentication with preset users and a role selector for testing.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines app roles, their permissions, and utility helpers for role-based access.
frontend/src/components/states/AccessDen: UI screen showing an access-denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/states/QueryBoun: Wrapper component standardizing loading, error, and empty states for React Query results.
Defines reusable loading, error, and empty state UI components with optional messages, icons, and actions.
frontend/src/config/dataMode.ts: Provides helpers to read and determine whether the app runs in MOCK or BACKEND data mode based on environment variables.
frontend/src/data/api/backendClient.ts: Implements a client that maps Motoko backend actor calls to frontend models, including orgs, projects, profiles, and documents.
frontend/src/data/client.ts: Exports a unified data client that routes operations to either the mock client or the backend client depending on the configured mode.
frontend/src/data/mock/mockClient.ts: Implements in‑memory mock versions of backend operations using seeded data, returning Promises for compatibility.
frontend/src/data/mock/seed.ts: Contains mock seed data for organizations, users, projects, and related entities used by the mock client.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for handling Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useStage1Client.ts: Chooses between mock or backend data client based on mode and actor availability, exposing readiness and fetching states.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.ptBR.ts: Contains centralized pt-BR UI strings for actions, states, errors, success messages, auth, and navigation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light/dark mode, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/org/OrgProvider.tsx: Manages current organization state, persistence, and loading based on authentication and backend data.
frontend/src/pages/auth/CreateOrganizati: Form page to create an organization, update selection, refresh org list, and navigate to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen supporting mock-mode role selection or Internet Identity login, redirecting authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SelectOrganizati: Lists available organizations, allows selecting or creating one, and updates backend auth when needed.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Signup form with validation, mock submit delay, and redirect to login.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ActivitiesPa: Lists activities, filters by status, and allows creating new activities via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContactsPage: Manages contacts with search, create, edit, and delete operations using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContractsPag: Displays recurring contracts, filters by status, and shows MRR metrics with a new contract dialog.
frontend/src/pages/internal/CustomerSucc: Shows customer health metrics, NPS data, and allows creating NPS campaigns.
frontend/src/pages/internal/DashboardPag: Fetches org data (contacts, deals, contracts, activities) and displays calculated business metrics and recent activity in a dashboard layout.
frontend/src/pages/internal/DealDetailPa: Loads a specific deal and its contact, showing detailed information, status, stage, and metadata with navigation back to the pipeline.
Manages and displays financial transactions with filtering, metrics, and dialogs to create new income or expense entries.
frontend/src/pages/internal/PipelinePage: Displays deals by stage with CRUD dialogs, filtering, and navigation to deal details using react-query for data management.
Shows available reports, export history, and options for generating reports by period and format.
frontend/src/pages/internal/SettingsPage: Renders an internal settings UI with tabs for general organization info and preferences. Includes forms for editing organization details and timezone selection.
frontend/src/pages/portal/DeliverablesPa: Displays project deliverables grouped by status using React Query. Provides tab filtering and handles empty or unloaded project states.
Manages organization documents with listing, upload dialog, and category mapping. Uses React Query for fetching, uploading, and refreshing document data.
frontend/src/pages/portal/KpisPage.tsx: Shows KPIs for the active project with trend indicators and update timestamps. Fetches KPI data via React Query and handles empty or missing project states.
frontend/src/pages/portal/MeetingsPage.t: Lists upcoming and past project meetings and allows scheduling new meetings through a dialog. Fetches and creates meetings using React Query tied to the active project.
frontend/src/pages/portal/MessagesPage.t: Displays project message threads, fetches and sends messages, and shows role badges with a text input for new messages.
frontend/src/pages/portal/PortalSettings: Provides UI for toggling and saving portal notification and display settings using local state.
frontend/src/pages/portal/ProjectDashboa: Fetches and lists projects, manages the active project selection, and shows a summary card for the selected project's status and details.
frontend/src/pages/portal/StageTimelineP: Loads a project's details and displays its stage progression using a predefined timeline of stages.
frontend/src/pages/portal/TasksPage.tsx: Displays tasks grouped by status, supports creating tasks and updating their status, and uses dialogs for task creation.
frontend/src/portal/useActiveProject.ts: Manages the active project ID with sessionStorage persistence and provides setters and reset functionality.
frontend/src/types/model.ts: Defines TypeScript types and interfaces for orgs, users, CRM entities, customer success, and finance records.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, write, and persist URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins with extended CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes project state, visual identity requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests for global UI updates.
